title: With margins back to pre-covid level, Hero MotoCorp targets enhanced market share, biz growth
description: "We talked about 100 cities by December, glad to report that we have already crossed 36 cities as we speak and we will be covering 100 cities well before December end. And then of course we will be building the portfolio, which will be next year, on our way to EV leadership which is our goal," Hero MotoCorp CEO Niranjan Gupta said.
